abstract: Carl C. Icahn has extended his bid for shares of Lions Gate Entertainment until Dec. 10 and changed the conditions of the offer.

lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn has extended his tender offer for shares of the Lions Gate Entertainment Corporation until Dec. 10 and altered the conditions of the bid.

headline.main: Icahn Alters Offer for Lions Gate
